snippet: Scott Thompson, PayPal’s president, will try to revamp Yahoo, the struggling online media company. He succeeds Carol Bartz, who was dismissed in September.
abstract: Yahoo names PayPal president Scott Thompson as its new chief executive; analysts say he has a background mainly in technology rather than digital media or corporate turnarounds; he will try to revamp company that is losing momentum against Google and Facebook.

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Scott Thompson, PayPal’s president, will try to revamp Yahoo, the struggling online media company. He succeeds Carol Bartz, who was dismissed in September.

headline.seo: Scott Thompson, PayPal Executive, to Become Chief of Yahoo
